name: 8 Eyes: Belmont's Quest
overview: A hack of the Taxan NES release 8 Eyes. In the hack, Simon Belmont from the Castlevania series replaces Orin the Falconer in the original 8 Eyes release.  The Simon character has his signature whip as his main weapon in replacing the small sword in the original.  Some of the classic Castlevania secondary weapons are also available in the hack but otherwise the hack does not change any of the main story line of 8 Eyes.
